description: Header file defining functions and constants for managing radio traffic harvesting and reporting intervals, including setting/getting harvesting status, reporting periods, polling periods, defaults, and override time-to-live (TTL).

methods.name: SetRISHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Sets the harvesting status for radio traffic scans, returning 0 on success and 1 on failure.

methods.name: GetRISHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Retrieves the current harvesting status as boolean.

methods.name: SetRISReportingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the reporting interval in seconds; returns 0 success, 1 failure.

methods.name: GetRISReportingPeriod
methods.description: Returns the current radio traffic reporting period in seconds.

methods.name: SetRISPollingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the polling interval in seconds; returns 0 success, 1 failure.

methods.name: GetRISPollingPeriod
methods.description: Returns the current radio traffic polling period in seconds.

methods.name: SetRISReportingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Sets the default reporting period in seconds.

methods.name: GetRISReportingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Returns the default radio traffic reporting period.

methods.name: SetRISPollingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Sets the default polling period in seconds.

methods.name: GetRISPollingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Returns the default radio traffic polling period.

methods.name: GetRISOverrideTTL
methods.description: Gets the timeout (in seconds) after which RIS intervals revert to default values.

methods.name: SetRISOverrideTTL
methods.description: Sets the timeout in seconds for RIS scans with accelerated polling.

methods.name: GetRISOverrideTTLDefault
methods.description: Gets the default timeout for accelerated scans.

methods.name: ValidateRISPeriod
methods.description: Validates specified interval value to ensure it is within valid range.
